headline.main: SOCIALIST HAILED IN FRENCH PRESS; Jaures's Memory, Doctrines Are Revived by Newspapers on Anniversary Eve SIGNIFICANCE IS STRESSED Resurgence of Popularity Is Linked to Laval Forecast of Form of Government

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, July 31 -- On the anniversary of the assassination of the great French Socialist leader Jean Jaures twenty-eight years ago, it was noted today that the Socialist newspapers of unoccupied France have been allowed to devote much space to Jaures and his socialism and that elsewhere in the press there is to be found much speculation on the future government in France.
abstract: Socialist press marking of J Jaures assassination anniv linked to Laval plans for Socialist Govt
